捏.definition: to hold between the thumb and fingers; to pinch; to mold (using the fingers); to hold (lit. in one's hand and fig.); to join together; to fabricate (a story, a report, etc)

捏一把冷汗.definition: to break out into a cold sweat (idiom)

捏一把汗.definition: to break out into a cold sweat (idiom)

捏合.definition: to act as a go between

捏脊.definition: form of therapeutic massage, mainly for children, in which a roll of skin is squeezed, working from the base of the spine to the neck (TCM)
